title: Goodness of Fit Test
text: The goodness-of-fit test is used to decide whether a population with an unknown distribution "fits" a known distribution.

title: Independence Test
text: The test for independence is used to decide whether two variables (factors) are independent or dependent.

title: Homogeneity
text: The test for homogeneity is used to decide if two populations with unknown distributions have the same distribution as each other
